duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality of care with direct and/or indirect patient care utilizing professional nursing skills and knowledge.
Assess learning needs, readiness to learn, and identify barriers to learning, incorporating patient's education into daily activities based on age, cultural, and spiritual values.
Document admission assessment, plan, interventions, and medication use, and monitor its effects and outcomes.
Utilize the information management system to enhance communication and document change in patient's condition.
Prioritize work assignments based on changing situations and communicate transfer of patient responsibility and pertinent information.
Recognize and integrate patient special needs, individualize care, and knowledgeable in abuse recognition and referral.
Include pain management and supportive care issues in the plan of care and adhere to infection control standards specific to patient care.
